I stop here but the case studies and the recording of these deaths is infinite: there are those who suddenly suddenly fall and falls from the roof, those who put their heads in a manhole, who improvise whitewashing and falls from the staircase, who starts washing the windows of the windows and falls on the streets, those who become a editor of curtains and shutters and falls inside and abroad. Whoever comes back the arteries in the garage with "smoothies" of various kinds, who starts to prune the trees of the garden and are overwhelmed, etc ... I could continue infinitely. In short, the house is full of dangers and putting yourself doing jobs that require caution is very, very dangerous. Nothing has changed since I painted this picture on solitude in 198.
